<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Hamstringing Strike](/Feats.aspx?ID=3902) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Kingmaker</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Ranger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=136" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Kingmaker Companion Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=151) pg. 23</row>

</column>

---

You slow your foes with a well-aimed attack. Make a Strike against your hunted prey with a –2 penalty. If you hit your prey, the creature takes a –5-foot status penalty to Speed. If you critically hit your prey, the creature takes a –10-foot status penalty to Speed. A creature immune to bleed damage does not take this penalty. The penalty can be removed using any method that removes [persistent bleed damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) or offers a flat check to do so, such as [Administer First Aid](/Actions.aspx?ID=54).

<title level="2">Adventuring with Ekundayo</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Kingmaker Companion Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=151) pg. 23</row>

Ekundayo eventually develops his own methods to pursue his favored enemies—giants. Once he gains the Magical Crafting feat at 4th level, he begins to craft specialized ammunition and runes for weapons. As long as his attitude toward the PCs is at least friendly, he shares these discoveries with them, unlocking the following ranger class feats and items as soon as his level equals the level of the feat or item.

**Related Feats**: [Giant Hunter](/Feats.aspx?ID=3900), [Giant Slayer](/Feats.aspx?ID=3904), [Roll with It (Ranger)](/Feats.aspx?ID=3903), [The Harder They Fall (Ranger)](/Feats.aspx?ID=3901)
name: Hamstringing Strike
